title: Planning for Legacy: Long-Term Impact and Future Weddings
theme: Leveraging experience to influence future events and personal legacy
subtopics: Establishing a wedding planning framework for future use
Setting up a budget tracking system for ongoing events
Creating a portfolio of work for professional opportunities
Mentoring others interested in destination weddings
Exploring sustainable and eco-friendly wedding practices
Planning anniversary celebrations inspired by the event
Documenting legacy stories for family and community
Evaluating personal growth and future aspirations
continuity_hooks: Closes the project with future-oriented planning
